jmud
Class Room

java.lang.Object
  jmud.Room

public class Room
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a room that can contain entities.

Author:
Will Pall

Constructor Detail

Room

public Room(int id,
            java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String description)
Constructs a room with the given id, title, and description. The room will contain no entities and have no exits.

Parameters:
id - Unique ID of the room
title - Title of the room
description - Description of the room
